statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, assessment_date FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_date <= '2022-07-31';
SELECT project_name, responsible_engineer FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE responsible_engineer LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT project_name, environmental_impact FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE environmental_impact IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_location, responsible_engineer FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_name, environmental_impact FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE project_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT DISTINCT responsible_engineer FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, LENGTH(environmental_impact) AS impact_length FROM environmental_impact_assessments ORDER BY impact_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM construction_projects
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM construction_projects
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_location FROM construction_projects ORDER BY project_id ASC
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM construction_projects WHERE project_start_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact ORDER BY impact_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM construction_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM construction_projects WHERE project_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_location, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE project_location = 'New York' ORDER BY project_start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_impacts FROM construction_projects JOIN environmental_impact ON construction_projects.project_id = environmental_impact.project_id GROUP BY project_name;

SELECT project_name, impact_type, impact_description FROM construction_projects JOIN environmental_impact ON construction_projects.project_id = environmental_impact.project_id WHERE impact_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessment;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date FROM environmental_impact_assessment;
SELECT * FROM assessment_criteria WHERE weight > 0.5;
SELECT criteria_name, description FROM assessment_criteria ORDER BY criteria_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, location, end_date FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, location, start_date FROM environmental_impact_assessment ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, assessment_type FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE assessment_type = 'Environmental' ORDER BY project_name;
SELECT criteria_name, description FROM assessment_criteria WHERE weight > 0.5;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE location = 'California' AND assessment_type = 'Social';
SELECT project_name, stakeholder_name, role FROM environmental_impact_assessment INNER JOIN project_stakeholders ON environmental_impact_assessment.project_id = project_stakeholders.project_id;
SELECT * FROM environmental_reports;
SELECT id, project_name, location FROM construction_projects WHERE project_manager = 'John Smith';
SELECT id, name, contact_email FROM stakeholders WHERE role = 'Engineer';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_name, upload_date FROM project_documents ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_reports ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, location FROM environmental_reports WHERE impact_score > 50;
SELECT project_manager, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM stakeholders WHERE role IS NOT NULL;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM project_documents WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ConstructionProjects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, location FROM ConstructionProjects;
SELECT assessment_id, risk_level, impact_description FROM EnvironmentalAssessments;
SELECT worker_name, specialization, contact_number FROM ConstructionWorkers;
SELECT project_id, task_description, status FROM ProjectTasks;
SELECT * FROM ConstructionProjects WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ConstructionProjects WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01' AND start_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT p.project_name, COUNT(t.task_id) AS task_count FROM ConstructionProjects p LEFT JOIN ProjectTasks t ON p.project_id = t.project_id GROUP BY p.project_name;

SELECT w.worker_name, w.specialization, p.project_name FROM ConstructionWorkers w INNER JOIN ProjectTasks t ON w.worker_id = t.worker_id INNER JOIN ConstructionProjects p ON t.project_id = p.project_id WHERE p.location = 'Los Angeles';

SELECT a.assessment_date, c.project_name, a.impact_description, a.risk_level FROM ConstructionProjects c INNER JOIN EnvironmentalAssessments a ON c.project_id = a.project_id WHERE a.risk_level > 3 ORDER BY a.assessment_date DESC;
